author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Midst waves of woe, the oil doth shackle,
Concerns o'er demand, in battle and tackle,
As fret o'er Russia's uncertain claim,
Dooms merchant ships to sail in vain.

Beneath Ygdrasil, Kering acquires Creed,
A mighty clan with prowess, indeed,
Thus RBC's whisperers acclaim,
For fragrance of scale, the sea shall name.

The dollar, like Loki, sneaky it yields,
As equities strengthened in Valhalla's fields,
Doubt not, brave warriors, its weakness past,
Awake thy gaze, the tide will change, at last.

feedItems.title: Oil Remains Rangebound as Economic Worries Dominate
feedItems.description: Oil prices rose but remained largely rangebound, as concerns over demand counter uncertainty in Russia

feedItems.title: Kering Acquisition of Creed Adds Instant Scale, Capability
feedItems.description: Kering’s acquisition of Creed adds immediate scale and capacity, RBC Capital Markets said, which likes the fragrance company’s in-house manufacturing and distribution operations.

feedItems.title: Dollar Falls for Now, But Weakness Might Not Last
feedItems.description: The dollar edged lower as equities rose, dampening demand for safe-haven currencies, but investors should be wary of anticipating further declines, ING said, as focus turns to data and Fed comments for signs of whether interest rates will rise again after July.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Metal's worth doth swell, as greenbacks slide,
A current fair for goods of art and trade,
Base elements, and golden treasures bide,
A shift in fortune's winds, now kindly swayed.

For Lordstown's wheeled dreams, the fates turn grim,
Of electric steads, bankruptcy declared,
Once praised by lords and rulers, vital vim,
In silent sparks, for now, their venture snared.

Aston Martin's course, to riches set,
With targets bold, esteemed upon the way,
Ere long, with might and effort, gains be met,
And prosperous future dawns in bright display.

feedItems.title: Metal Prices Rise as Dollar Slides
feedItems.description: Base metals and gold pushed higher as the dollar faltered, helping provide a tailwind for industrial goods.

feedItems.title: EV Startup Lordstown Files for Bankruptcy
feedItems.description: The electric-truck maker, once cheered by investors during the SPAC boom and lauded by former President Donald Trump as a savior for a closed GM factory in Ohio, filed for bankruptcy.

feedItems.title: Aston Martin on Track to Hit Key Financial Targets
feedItems.description: Aston Martin said it expected to meet its targets of £2 billion in revenue and around £500 million in adjusted earnings in 2024, and with “persistent momentum”, is likely to exceed them in 2025.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In lands of Eurozone, a tale unfolds,
Of bond spreads tight'ning, as hope takes hold.
By central banks' tones, these hearts be swayed,
Risk assets bask in fair light displayed.

To distant Orient, our ears shall hark,
Where Li Qiang sings in mead'w of Davos' lark.
With confidence, GDP growth he meets,
And scorns the West in their dubious feats.

Then cross the sea, to stout U.K. shore,
Where shop-price inflation eases, dear hearts implore.
A breath of relief, for fresh food it seems,
Fills the air, as the cost of staples redeems.

feedItems.title: Tighter Eurozone Bond Spreads Signal Affordability of Funding Costs
feedItems.description: The spectacular tightening of eurozone sovereign bond-yield spreads suggest that risk assets have taken the recent change of central-bank tone in their stride, ING said.

feedItems.title: China's Premier Confident of Meeting GDP Growth Target
feedItems.description: Chinese premier Li Qiang struck a confident tone in the country’s economic performance and blasted the West’s concept of economic de-risking in a keynote speech at a meeting known as the Summer Davos.

feedItems.title: U.K. Shop-Price Inflation Eases
feedItems.description: Prices at U.K. stores in the first week of June were 8.4% higher on year, but lower than May’s record high of 9%. helped by cheaper fresh food as retailers cut the cost of many staples.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Nippon's land, the coins do sway,
Minister Suzuki watchful stay,
He doth observe, with careful gaze,
The yen's one-sided, rapid craze.

Of mushrooms magic, LSD,
In Silicon's realm, entrepreneurs free,
Musk and Brin join the dance,
Opening minds, their lives enhance.

And in the court, so high above,
Louisiana pleads, with push and shove,
Yet dismiss'd the plea, a district new,
Black-majority's strength anew.

feedItems.title: Japan Finance Minister Calls Yen's Moves 'One-Sided and Rapid'
feedItems.description: The Japanese government was keeping a watchful eye on the movement of the foreign exchange market, said Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki.

feedItems.title: Magic Mushrooms. LSD. Ketamine. The Drugs That Power Silicon Valley.
feedItems.description: Entrepreneurs including Elon Musk and Sergey Brin are part of a psychedelic movement that proponents hope will expand minds, enhance lives and produce business breakthroughs.

feedItems.title: The Supreme Court, in an expected move, dismissed Louisiana's emergency plea to block creation of a second Black-majority congressional district.
feedItems.description: The Supreme Court, in an expected move, dismissed Louisiana’s emergency plea to block creation of a second Black-majority congressional district.
